select t.id, t.title, tu.username, rep.last_reply_time, rep.reply_num from thread t left join forum f on t.forum_id = f.id left join admin_user tu on tu.id = t.create_user_id left join (select thread_id, max(create_time) last_reply_time, count(*) reply_num from post group by thread_id) rep on rep.thread_id = t.id where f.id = #{forumId}
and t.title like #{searchLike}
